_description: James Ryman, an Epiphany carol — six quatrains (aaab), including refrain, ‘The sonne of god & king of blis’, plus burden: ‘Of a mayden to vs borne is / the sonne of god and king of blis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Nowe this tyme Rex pacificusIs man become for loue of
                    vs…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Of heuen blisse to make vs surethe sonne of god & king of
                    blisse
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 236-7.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977:  90; 1977, 79.
